ApplicationRating.title: ApplicationRating
ApplicationRating.description: You are to take the Application Rating and divide by 10 Format: number and to populate the Application Rating field of the Application record

Applications.title: Applications
Applications.description: These are the Application__c records to be created

EmailAdress.title: EmailAdress
EmailAdress.description: This is the Email Address of the Candidate and serves as the unique identifier of the Candidate__c record

Job_Spec.title: Job_Spec
Job_Spec.description: This is the Current Job_Spec__c record Id and the record you are on right now and to populate the Job_Spec__c field of the Application record

Rating.title: Rating
Rating.description: You are to take the Application Rating and divide by 10 Format: number

Resume_Summary.title: Resume_Summary
Resume_Summary.description: This is the Resume Summary provided per candidate, to update the Application_Overview__c field
